properties.entry: SELECT MOVIE_NO , MOVIE_TITLE , GENRE , DIRECTOR , MAIN_PATH FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR GENRE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR DIRECTOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR ACTOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

INSERT INTO MOVIE ( MOVIE_NO , MOVIE_TITLE , MOVIE_CONTENT , GENRE , PLAYTIME , COUNTRY , AGE_LV , OPEN_DATE , DIRECTOR , AUDIENCE_COUNT , ACTOR , PREVIEW , STATUS , GRADE , TITLE_PATH , CONTENT_PATH , TASTE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MOVIENO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
